about_the_game:
In Frontier Forge, you take on the role of a humble peasant living under the oppressive rule of a tyrannical king and his cruel lord. Forced to fight for your freedom, you must build a rebellion from the ground up. Can you overthrow the forces that control your land and lead your people to freedom?

This action-packed RPG blends survival, base-building, and village management into an immersive experience. Gather resources, craft weapons, and recruit villagers to help you build your stronghold and expand your power. The more you grow, the more options you unlock for survival, crafting, and warfare.

Current Features:

  • Survival Mechanics: Gather essential resources like wood, stone, and ore to craft tools, build structures, and ensure your village survives the harsh elements.

  • Base Building and Management: Establish a safe haven and expand your village with the help of recruited villagers. Assign tasks like woodcutting, mining, and construction to build a thriving community.

  • Recruitment and Worker System: Recruit villagers from the lands around you. Each one has a unique skillset that will help your rebellion grow stronger. Manage their tasks efficiently to ensure resources are gathered and buildings are constructed.

  • Crafting: Craft different type of armors and weapons.

  • Harvesting: Use tools to chop down trees and mine different kind of ores, such as stone, tin and copper.

  • Combat: Fight against evil bandits that are guarding resources.

  • Hunting: Hunt wildlife to survive.

  • Open world exploration: Explore an open world.

content_descriptors.notes: The game will have combat and depiction of blood, like if you hit someone with weapons or hunt animals etc in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Frontier Forge is an action RPG with survival and base-building elements. As a peasant, you must gather resources, recruit villagers, and craft weapons to defend yourself from bandits occupying the lands. Build your base, manage your people, and fight for freedom in a world on the brink of war.
